attributes.action: Change the United Kingdom national anthem from "God Save the Queen / King".
attributes.background: The anthem is outdated and deals more with the monarch than the nation and assumes that the United Kingdom will remain intact and remain a monarchy.  Britain is famous for music so let us update this jingoistic durge.

rejection.details:
I'm sorry - we cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/108656

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
